title: IRC27 IOTA NFT Metadata Schema
description: A JSON schema for validating IRC27 compliant NFT metadata

standard.description: identifier for the metadata standard used

version.description: version of the metadata standard used

tokenUri.description: URI pointing to the resource where the file is hosted

policyId.description: unique policy ID identifier for the collection

policyName.description: human readable name for the NFT

royalties.description: object containing the payout addresses mapped to their percentage share

description.description: some information abou the NFT project

attributes.description: object containing any additional arbitrary key-pairs
